product_name: Water Bottles with Time Marking - Leakproof Reusable 32oz Motivational Water Bottle with Straw - BPA Free Daily Christmas Xmas Sports Gym Workout 1l Bottle for Running (Ombre Mermaid)
description: Convenient One Click Operation - The flip top lid of water bottle with straw is designed with a secure lock, making it dust and leak proof. Simply open motivational water bottle with one hand by clicking the button and removable straw allows you to enjoy spill-proof sipping or fast water flow. Tritan 1l water bottle includes carry loop handle which is easy for clip-on and on-the-go hydration. Functional Design - The flip top lid is designed with a secure lock, making it dust and leak proof. Simply open with one hand by clicking the button and removable straw allows you to enjoy spill-proof sipping or fast water flow. Bottle includes portable strap and carry loop handle, it is easy for clip-on and on-the-go hydration. Motivational Water Bottle - Etched with unique inspirational quotes and time marker, this water bottle is very suitable for measuring your daily water consumption, reminding you to stay hydrated throughout the day. Featured with measuring scale help you check the actual amount of water intake easily and clearly. The wide-mouth opening is easy to fill with ice cubes and easy to clean. Premium Quality Tritan Material - Equipped with an exquisite Wrist Strap and a special reflective frosted shell, the BPA free 1L water bottle is 100% LEAK-PROOF. Our top-notch build quality makes it durable and impact resistant. Perfect companion to bring along to the gym. Quench your thirst from running, hiking, cycling and camping, etc. Large Capacity - Our water Bottle can fill up to 1L of water. Reduce the number of times you need to refill water, and save you more time to do what you want to do. Ergonomic design makes our water bottles with straw the perfect choice for everyone
